items: Start by kneeling on the ground with your feet flat on the floor and your toes pointing forward.
Place your hands on your hips or behind your head.
Engage your core and glutes, and then explosively jump up as high as you can.
As you jump, extend your hips and knees fully.
Land softly back on the ground in the kneeling position.
Repeat for the desired number of reps.
Increases lower body strength and power
Improves explosive jumping ability
Engages core muscles for stability and balance
Can be modified for different fitness levels by adjusting the depth of the squat and the height of the jump
Provides a cardiovascular workout
Can be done with minimal equipment, making it a convenient exercise to do at home or while traveling
